full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Thank you Chris

When I click on 'edit with elementor' I see the layout below - the green buttons are not required. The layout I see at this link Community Agendas and Minutes | Murray Zircon is correct. Is there a reason for the same page being displayed differently?



I also added a second heading on the page so I can group 'Agendas' together and 'Minutes' together under the respective headings. I duplicated the Listing Grid and then wanted to delete the duplicate entries that did not belong; however I was unable to do this. Can you please guide me how to do this?

Many thanks

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

https://murrayzircon.com.au/agendas-and-minutes/

Chrystal

full_threads.body:
Hi Chrystal, 

Great to speak earlier today. 

Confirming we have completed the requested changes:
1. https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/ + button with anchor link. 
2. https://murrayzircon.com.au/agendas-and-minutes/

The new minutes can be added here: https://murrayzircon.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=agendas

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

@chris All good on this one.
(Time: 15mins)

Sorry Joel, one more on this one. 
on page: https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/
Can the button "Learn more about..." be an anchor link to section:

Murray Mallee Commun....

@chris Sure, all good on this one.

https://murrayzircon.com.au/agendas-and-minutes/

(Time: 30mins)

Hi @joel I met with Chrystal to get the info and prepared the pages we need.

https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/ is ok and nothing needs to be changed.

https://murrayzircon.com.au/agendas-and-minutes/
1. fix header
2. style the display of minutes and agenda (ok to use https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenancy/repairs-maintenance-resources/ for inspiration.

(time:30mins)

Hi Chrystal, 

Chris here jumping on behalf of Rica. 

Let's jump on a Zoom call to go through your goals for this page. You can choose your preferred time here: https://wolfiq.com.au/chri

@chris need your help on this. This is what Joel and I came up with - https://murrayzircon.com.au/community-draft/ We created custom post type Agendas where the customer can upload their Agendas and Minutes content, pdf file and terms pdf file. In we added a listing in the page to show the latest uploaded Agendas and Minutes. Then there's button to View all the Agendas and Minutes materials.

Hi Rica

Can we please talk on the phone on Thursday? Something is not right on my end. My 'Murray Mallee Community Consultative Committee' heading and content has been removed and I am now seeing this below. This section was pretty much how I wanted it at the weekend and hope it can be restored (see screenshot attached).

The only changes that needed to be made was to provide a solution to upload and display multiple Agenda and Minute documents as per my email on 5/10.

When a user clicks on the View Agendas and Minutes button, ideally a page would open where the uploaded Agendas and Minutes would be listed in a well displayed format.

Let's talk further to resolve this.

Kind Regards

Chrystal

full_threads.body:
Hi Chrystal,

Sorry about the confusion.

We have updated the Community Page Draft. In the page you will see "The Latest Agenda's & Minutes" section where you can see the most current materials. Then a button to redirect you to the Agendas Archive page where you will see all the Agenda's & Mettings uploaded to the website.

I've created a video for you: https://www.loom.com/share/7b0629cabf00419294d1ff7366444d67?sid=47ff2be2-20a9-4c32-a2d0-a14af3d10d85

Let me know if you would like further changes.
